channel.title: Mark's Prayer Site
channel.description: Recent content on Mark's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: November 1, 2025 Today's Verse Proverbs 12:11 [11] Whoever works his land will have plenty of bread, but he who follows worthless pursuits lacks sense. Today's Memory Verse Ephesians 6:12 - For we do not wrestle against flesh and blood, but against the rulers, against the authorities, against the cosmic powers over this present darkness, against the spiritual forces of evil in the heavenly places. Today's Westminster Catechism Q/A 92 - What is a sacrament?
